Title: Fierce-browed, I coolly defy a thousand pointing figures, head bowed like a willing ox I serve the children
Designer: Shanghai Art Design Company (上海美术设计公司)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Export version of a poster published in 1971 with the title 'Carry on and develop the revolutionary spirit of Lu Xun' (继承和发扬鲁迅的革命精神). The title of this version is from Lu Xun's poem Self-mockery (自嘲), written in 1932 and quoted by Mao in his Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art, 1942.
